ruleContent.content:
<js>
paperid=baseUrl.match(/paperid=(\d+)/)[1];
code=result.match(/vercodechk.*?'[^']+'/)?result.match(/vercodechk.*?'([^']+)'/)[1]:'';
url=book.origin+'/showpapercolor.php,';
body='paperid='+paperid+'&vercodechk='+code;
option={
"method":"POST",
"body":String(body)
}
result=java.ajax(url+JSON.stringify(option));

eggs=java.getString('@@class.uk-placeholder.-1@html');
if(!eggs.match(/【作家想說的話：】|加載中.../) && eggs!=""){
eggs="【彩蛋内容：】"+eggs
}else{eggs=''}
write=java.getString('@@id.colorpanelwritersay@html');
result=result+write+eggs;
if(!String(result).match(/[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/) && !(String(result).match(/login\.php/))){
result="此章节需要购买\n💰"+java.getString('@@class.uk-card.0@class.uk-list.0@tag.li.10@text&&class.uk-alert-danger@html')
}else{result=result}
String(result).match(/login.php/)?'请登录后刷新正文阅读':result
</js>
##<.*?mages/fullcolor.png.*?>
ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##此章节需要购买[\s\S]+?💰[\s\S]+?此章节需要购买[\s\S]+?💰##请刷新正文看彩蛋

ruleExplore.kind:
tag.font.-2@text&&tag.font.2@text##(.)攻(.)受##$1$2
<js>
str = String(result);
result = str.replace(/原創/g, '')
.replace(/\//g, ',')
.replace(/\[/g, '')
.replace(/\]/g, '')
.replace(/.未設置./g, '')
.replace(/來/g, '来')
.replace(/男男/g, '')
.replace(/強/g, '强')
.replace(/現/g, '现')
.replace(/劇/g, '剧')
.replace(/結/g, '结')
.replace(/連載中/g, '连载')
.replace(/纖細/g, '纤细')
.replace(/輕/g, '轻')
.replace(/鬆/g, '松')
.replace(/馬/g, '马')
.replace(/園/g, '园')
.replace(/溫/g, '温')
.replace(/帥/g, '帅')
.replace(/職場/g, '职场')
.replace(/靈異/g, '灵异')
.replace(/種/g, '种')
.replace(/網遊/g, '网游')
.replace(/勵/g, '励')
.replace(/宮/g, '宫')
.replace(/會/g, '会')
.replace(/運動/g, '运动')
.replace(/話/g, '话')
.replace(/俠/g, '侠')
.replace(/羅/g, '罗')
.replace(/視/g, '视')
.replace(/懸/g, '悬')
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
paperid=baseUrl.match(/paperid=(\d+)/)[1];
code=result.match(/vercodechk.*?'[^']+'/)?result.match(/vercodechk.*?'([^']+)'/)[1]:'';
url=book.origin+'/showpapercolor.php,';
body='paperid='+paperid+'&vercodechk='+code;
option={
"method":"POST",
"body":String(body)
}
result=java.ajax(url+JSON.stringify(option));

eggs=java.getString('@@class.uk-placeholder.-1@html');
if(!eggs.match(/【作家想說的話：】|加載中.../) && eggs!=""){
eggs="【彩蛋内容：】"+eggs
}else{eggs=''}
write=java.getString('@@id.colorpanelwritersay@html');
result=result+write+eggs;
if(!String(result).match(/[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/) && !(String(result).match(/login\.php/))){
result="此章节需要购买\n💰"+java.getString('@@class.uk-card.0@class.uk-list.0@tag.li.10@text&&class.uk-alert-danger@html')
}else{result=result}
String(result).match(/login.php/)?'请登录后刷新正文阅读':result
</js>
##<.*?mages/fullcolor.png.*?>
ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##此章节需要购买[\s\S]+?💰[\s\S]+?此章节需要购买[\s\S]+?💰##请刷新正文看彩蛋

2.正文内容为空时刷新正文
3.网不好时，或访问网站慢时，正文大概率为空
4.有新购买的章节记得更新目录后再看

<js>
if(result.match(/請勿瀏覽及購買本館商品，本網站已依照台灣網站內容分級規定處理。/)){
url="https://www.popo.tw{{@@id.books-form@action}}";

value=result.match(/name="_poporf-tk001" value="([^"]+)">/)[1];

Cookie=String(cookie.getCookie(baseUrl));
body='cid=&type=&_poporf-tk001='+value;

cookies=java.post(url,body,{"cookie":Cookie}).cookies();

Cookies=String(cookies).match(/\{(.*?)\}/)[1]+'; '+Cookie;

header={"Cookie":String(Cookies)}
headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}
java.put('header',JSON.stringify(headers));
Url=baseUrl+','+JSON.stringify(headers);

result=String(java.ajax(Url))

}else{result=result}
</js>

Cookies=String(cookies).match(/\{(.*?)\}/)[1]+'; '+Cookie;

}else{result=result}
</js>

bookSourceComment:
需登录
◎只看楼主：
在设置源变量（该源所有书应用）或者设置书籍变量（只有本书应用）里填上『只看楼主』则只会显示楼主内容
❗️注意：楼主如果是『匿名青花鱼』改规则会导致无正文内容，请删除设置变量里的《只看楼主》
做完更改后都需要刷新，正文如果缓存了也需要刷新，或者清楚缓存

ruleContent.replaceRegex:
<js>
String(result)
.replace(/\s*发表于\s*/g," 🕡 ")
.replace(/回复:『\s*/g,'回复:『')
.replace(/([cC])hanter((\s)?\d+)/g,'$1hapter$2')
</js>
##以下内容需要积分高于 \d+ 才可浏览

ruleExplore.author: tag.cite.0@a@text||tag.cite.0@text
ruleExplore.kind: {{@@tag.th@tag.a.3@progress}},{{@@th@em@a@text}},{{@@th@img.1@title##(热度):\s(\d+)##$2 $1}},{{@@class.num@a@text##(\d+)##$1 回复}},{{@@class.num@em@text##(\d+)##$1 查看}}##帖子被加分
ruleExplore.name: tag.th@tag.a.2@text||tag.a.-1@text##公告

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var n;
if
((result.match(/ \/ (\d+) 页/))!=null){
n=result.match(/ \/ (\d+) 页/)[1];
var list=[];
for(let i=1;i<=n;i++){
list.push({k:'第'+i+'页',v:baseUrl.replace(/page(?:%3D|=)\d+/g,'&page='+i)});
}
}else{
var list=[{k:'第1页',v:baseUrl}];
}
list
</js>

ruleBookInfo.tocUrl:
<js>
//工具函数
options ={
  "headers": {
    "Referer": baseUrl
  }
}
function add(url, options) {
  return !options ? url : `${url},${JSON.stringify(options)}`;
}
String.prototype.add=function (){return add(this, arguments[0])};
//获取验证码
img =`https://gaofuwu.com/mytool/getVerify/?d=${Math.random()}`
code=java.getVerificationCode((img+"").add(options))
//拼接链接
b="https://gaofuwu.com/mytool/getChapterList/"
aid=baseUrl.match(/(\d+)\/$/)[1]
options=Object.assign(options,{
  "body": `verify=${code}&aid=${aid}&sbt=提交`,
  "method": "POST"
})
b.add(options)
</js>

bookSourceComment:
m.gulongbbs.com
解决目前所见到的所有问题，包括页面解析、分页有的页面获取不到、图片转文字等问题，并对内容中出现的翻页断行、以前流行的35字换行排版、部分内容显示HTML源码、推广文字、广告等进行了恢复与过滤。
效果自认为是不错的，就是慢，巨慢，分页多的章节可能获取文字就要几分钟，毕竟，要做过滤和处理。
凑合用吧兄弟们，后续暂时不准备修改了。
地址发布页(浏览器打开)
http://www.diyibanzhu666.xyz
目前可用地址：
http://www.tz659.com
http://hdyp.net
http://www.bz3333.xyz
https://yydstxt.cc
获取最新可用网址
大家可以根据自己的网络情况选一个最快的来用
替换👉源域名👈链接即可
注意版主一系各站点数据库并非完全同步，所以换了地址之后原有的小说如果追更就需要重新搜索。
建议用复制出来源换个名称再批量改源的方式来做。

");}else if(baseUrl.match(/\/\d+\.html/)){ result=java.getElements("#articlecontent@p") }else{ eval(String(java.ajax("http://danmeirouwen.net/17mb/js/cryptojs_min.js"))); function d(a, b) { b = CryptoJS.MD5(b).toString(); var d = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(0, 16)); var e = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(16)); return CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(a, e, { iv: d, padding: CryptoJS.pad.Pkcs7 }).toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8) } result=eval(result.match(/(d\("[\s\S]+"\))\)/)[1]); }}

ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
list=java.getElements("@@class.BGsectionThree-content@li").toArray();
intro=java.getElements('#intro').html();
href='';text='';
for(i in list){
href=href+list[i].select('a:eq(1)').attr('href')+'\n';
text=text+'【'+i+'】'+list[i].html()+'\n';
}

ruleContent.content:
<js>
paperid=baseUrl.match(/paperid=(\d+)/)[1];
code=result.match(/vercodechk.*?'[^']+'/)?result.match(/vercodechk.*?'([^']+)'/)[1]:'';
url=book.origin+'/showpapercolor.php,';
body='paperid='+paperid+'&vercodechk='+code;
option={
"method":"POST",
"body":String(body)
}
result=java.ajax(url+JSON.stringify(option));

eggs=java.getString('@@class.uk-placeholder.-1@html');
if(!eggs.match(/【作家想說的話：】|加載中.../) && eggs!=""){
eggs="【彩蛋内容：】"+eggs
}else{eggs=''}
write=java.getString('@@id.colorpanelwritersay@html');
result=result+write+eggs;
if(!String(result).match(/[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/) && !(String(result).match(/login\.php/))){
result="此章节需要购买\n💰"+java.getString('@@class.uk-card.0@class.uk-list.0@tag.li.10@text&&class.uk-alert-danger@html')
}else{result=result}
String(result).match(/login.php/)?'请登录后刷新正文阅读':result
</js>

function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"https://hongxiuzhao.me":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];


 
  u=tag=="cat2"?'https://hongxiua.com/category/'+url+'/{{page}}/2/0':u;
 u=tag=="cat0"?'https://hongxiua.com/category/'+url+'/{{page}}/0/0':u;
 u=tag=="cat1"?'https://hongxiua.com/category/'+url+'/{{page}}/1/0':u;
 u=tag=="tag"?'https://hongxiua.com/tags/'+url+'/{{page}}':u;

 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))
</js>

ruleContent.content:
content={ childNode:[], childNodes: result.match(/nrid="([^"]+)";/)?java.getElements("#"+result.match(/nrid="([^"]+)";/)[1]+"@p").toArray():"", UpWz:function(m, i) { var k = Math.ceil((i + 1) % this.code); k = Math.ceil(m - k); return k }, load:function(){ this.code=String(result).match(/codeurl="(\d+)"/)[1]; var e =String(java.base64Decode(java.getString('[name=client]@content'))).split(/[A-Z]+%/); for (var i = 0; i < e.length; i++) { var k = this.UpWz(e[i], i); this.childNode[k]=this.childNodes[i] }} } if(baseUrl.match(/verify/)){ result="如果没获取到目录，说明验证码不对，详情页刷新重新获取验证码" }else{if(baseUrl.match(/\d+_2\.html/)){ content.load(); result=content.childNode.join("
");}else if(baseUrl.match(/\/\d+\.html/)){ result=java.getElements("#articlecontent@p") }else{ eval(String(java.ajax("http://www.ztgauntong.com/17mb/js/cryptojs_min.js"))); function d(a, b) { b = CryptoJS.MD5(b).toString(); var d = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(0, 16)); var e = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(16)); return CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(a, e, { iv: d, padding: CryptoJS.pad.Pkcs7 }).toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8) } result=eval(result.match(/(d\("[\s\S]+"\))\)/)[1]); }}

<js>
//一行个数
var nums = 4 ;
//分隔符
var separator = '::'

//标题::链接::一行个数::分类

all=["标   签::::1",
" NP ::np::4::a",
"父子::父子::4::a",
"兄弟::兄弟::4::a",
"年上::年上::4::a",
"校园::校园::4::a",
" B E ::BE::4::a",
"出轨::出轨::4::a",
"生子::生子::4::a",
"年下::年下::4::a",
"双性::双性::4::a",
"ABO::ABO::4::a",
"强强::强强::4::a",
"哥哥::哥哥::4::a",
"反攻::反攻::4::a",
"强制::强制::4::a",
"掰弯::掰弯::4::a",
"高 h::高h::4::a",
"主攻::主攻::4::a",
"互攻::互攻::4::a",
"快穿::快穿::4::a"
];

//@天天gg@酷安 下面不要动
function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"https://www.haitangsoushu.com/s/'+url+'/{{page}}/":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];
 u=tag=="a"?'https://www.haitangsoushu.com/s/'+url+'/{{page}}/':u;

 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))
</js>

<js>
list=java.getElements("@@class.BGsectionThree-content@li").toArray();
intro=java.getElements('#intro').html();
href='';text='';
for(i in list){
href=href+list[i].select('a:eq(1)').attr('href')+'\n';
text=text+'【'+i+'】'+list[i].html()+'\n';
}
java.put('list',href);
xu=(book.getVariable("custom")==null||book.getVariable("custom")=="")?"0":book.getVariable("custom");
laiyuan='当前来源【'+xu+'】';

</js>

"" == v || null == v || undefined == v
  ? ((v = "源站：\n线路：3"), source.setVariable(v))
  : v

  url = "https://qscxx1.com",
  J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url)),
  hv = v.split("\n")[0],
  pv = v.split("\n")[1];
//java.log(v)
//java.log(hv)
//java.log(pv)
host =
  -1 !== hv.indexOf("1")
    ? String(J.select("body p a").text().split(" ")[4])
    : -1 !== hv.indexOf("2")
    ? String(J.select("body p a").text().split(" ")[5])
    : -1 !== hv.indexOf("3")
    ? String(J.select("body p a").text().split(" ")[6])
    : -1 !== hv.indexOf("4")
    ? String(J.select("body p a").text().split(" ")[7])
    : -1 !== hv.indexOf("5")
    ? "https://www.mhhanman.xyz"
    : -1 !== hv.indexOf("6")
    ? "https://www.dsnbrw.xyz"
    : "https://www.dsduy.xyz"

<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements(".sul li"),
  data = [];
for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
  data.push({
    name: list[i].select(".name").text(),
    author: String(list[i].select(".stext p")[1].text()).replace(/[,xX&]|[图文][:：]/g, "/")
      .replace(/\/\/\/|\/\//g, "/"),
    kind: "",
    word: "",
    latest: "",
    intro: "",
    cover: list[i].select("img").attr("data-original"),
    url: list[i].select("a").attr("href")
  });
}
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
Date.prototype.Format = function (fmt) {
  var o= {
    "M+": this.getMonth() + 1,
    "d+": this.getDate(),
    "H+": this.getHours(),
    "m+": this.getMinutes(),
    "s+": this.getSeconds()
  };
  if (/(y+)/.test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (this.getFullYear() + "").substr(4 - RegExp.$1.length));
  for (var k in o)
  if (new RegExp("(" + k + ")").test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (RegExp.$1.length == 1) ? (o[k]) : (("00" + o[k]).substr(("" + o[k]).length)));
  return fmt;
};
date = new Date(new Date().getTime()).Format("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
var list = java.getElements("#detail-list-select li a"),
  data = [];
for (i in list) {
  data.push({
    title: i == list.length - 1 ? `${list[i].text()}〔${date}〕` : list[i].text(),
    link: list[i].attr("href"),
    isVip: i > 9 ? true : false
  });
};
flag == 1
  ? (java.put("Enable", 1), JSON.stringify(data))
  : java.toast("\n❗未启用书源❗");
</js>
$[*]
